1962 FIFA World Cup squads

\t\t\t

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

\n\t\t\t\t

Below are the squads for the 1962 FIFA World Cup final tournament in Chile. Switzerland (3), England (1), Spain (1) and West Germany (1) had players representing foreign clubs.

84FWJimmy Greaves(1940-02-20)20 February 1940 (aged 22)18 Tottenham Hotspur F.C.
94FWGerry Hitchens(1934-10-08)8 October 1934 (aged 27)5 Internazionale Milano F.C.
104FWJohnny Haynes (captain)(1934-10-17)17 October 1934 (aged 27)52 Fulham F.C.
114FWBobby Charlton(1937-10-11)11 October 1937 (aged 24)35 Manchester United F.C.
121GKAlan Hodgkinson(1936-08-16)16 August 1936 (aged 25)5 Sheffield United F.C.
134FWDerek Kevan*(1935-03-06)6 March 1935 (aged 27)14 West Bromwich Albion F.C.
143MFStan Anderson(1933-02-27)27 February 1933 (aged 29)2 Sunderland F.C.
152DFMaurice Norman(1934-05-08)8 May 1934 (aged 28)1 Tottenham Hotspur F.C.
162DFBobby Moore(1941-04-12)12 April 1941 (aged 21)1 West Ham United F.C.
173MFBryan Douglas(1934-05-27)27 May 1934 (aged 28)29 Blackburn Rovers F.C.
184FWRoger Hunt(1938-07-20)20 July 1938 (aged 23)1 Liverpool F.C.
194FWAlan Peacock(1937-10-29)29 October 1937 (aged 24)0 Middlesbrough F.C.
203MFGeorge Eastham(1936-09-23)23 September 1936 (aged 25)0 Arsenal F.C.
212DFDon Howe(1935-10-12)12 October 1935 (aged 26)23 West Bromwich Albion F.C.
223MFJimmy Adamson(1929-04-04)4 April 1929 (aged 33)0 Burnley F.C.
\n
    \n
  • Some sources state that only 21 of the 22 squad members travelled to the 1962 tournament in Chile, in that Derek Kevan was a stay-at-home reserve who was never called. [1]
    • \n
\n

 Argentina[edit]

\n

Head coach: Juan Carlos Lorenzo

\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n

 Bulgaria[edit]

\n

Head coach: Georgi Pachedzhiev

\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n
